summary: Aging Cuban musicians whose talents had been virtually forgotten following Castro's takeover of Cuba, are brought out of retirement by Ry Cooder, who travelled to Havana in order to bring the musicians together, resulting in triumphant performances of extraordinary music, and resurrecting the musicians' careers.
cast: Octavio Calderon|Joachim Cooder|Ry Cooder|Angel Terry Domech|Ibrahim Ferrer|Ibrahim Ferrer Jr.|Manuel Galbán|Hugo Garzón|Carlos Gonzalez|Juan de Marcos González|Rubén González|Pío Leyva|Manuel 'Puntillita' Licea|Orlando 'Cachaíto' López|Manuel 'Guajiro' Mirabal|Eliades Ochoa|Gilberto 'Papi' Oviedo|Alejandro Pichardo|Yanko Pichardo|Omara Portuondo|Jesús 'Aguaje' Ramos|Salvador Repilado Labrada|José Antonio Rodriguez|Compay Segundo|Benito Suárez Magana|Barbarito Torres|Amadito Valdés|Alberto 'Virgilio' Valdés|Lázaro Villa|Heitor Goldflus
title: Buena Vista Social Club
